aws::graph::propositions: # Amazon Sales and Marketing Costs Analysis
Amazon directs customers to its stores primarily through marketing channels.
Marketing channels include sponsored search.
Marketing channels include third-party customer referrals.
Marketing channels include social advertising.
Marketing channels include online advertising.
Marketing channels include television advertising.
Marketing channels include other initiatives.
Amazon's marketing costs are largely variable.
Marketing costs are based on growth in sales.
Marketing costs are based on changes in rates.
Increased competition for traffic sources would cause a corresponding change in Amazon's marketing costs.
Decreased competition for traffic sources would cause a corresponding change in Amazon's marketing costs.
Changes in the mix of marketing channels would cause a corresponding change in Amazon's marketing costs.
Sales and marketing costs include advertising expenses.
Sales and marketing costs include payroll expenses for personnel engaged in marketing activities.
Sales and marketing costs include payroll expenses for personnel engaged in selling activities.
Sales and marketing costs include related expenses for personnel engaged in marketing activities.
Sales and marketing costs include related expenses for personnel engaged in selling activities.
Sales and marketing costs include sales commissions related to AWS.
AWS is Amazon Web Services.
Sales and marketing costs decreased in 2024 compared to the prior year.
The decrease in sales and marketing costs in 2024 is primarily due to decreased payroll expenses for personnel engaged in marketing activities.
The decrease in sales and marketing costs in 2024 is primarily due to decreased payroll expenses for personnel engaged in selling activities.
The decrease in sales and marketing costs in 2024 is primarily due to decreased related expenses for personnel engaged in marketing activities.
The decrease in sales and marketing costs in 2024 is primarily due to decreased related expenses for personnel engaged in selling activities.
The decrease in sales and marketing costs in 2024 was partially offset by increased advertising expenses.
Changes in foreign exchange rates reduced sales and marketing costs by $263 million in 2024.

text:
#### Sales and Marketing

Sales and marketing costs include advertising and payroll and related expenses for personnel engaged in marketing and selling activities, including sales commissions related to AWS. We direct customers to our stores primarily through a number of marketing channels, such as our sponsored search, third-party customer referrals, social and online advertising, television advertising, and other initiatives. Our marketing costs are largely variable, based on growth in sales and changes in rates. To the extent there is increased or decreased competition for these traffic sources, or to the extent our mix of these channels shifts, we would expect to see a corresponding change in our marketing costs.

The decrease in sales and marketing costs in 2024, compared to the prior year, is primarily due to decreased payroll and related expenses for personnel engaged in marketing and selling activities, partially offset by increased advertising expenses. Changes in foreign exchange rates reduced sales and marketing costs by $263 million in 2024.
